attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in Nicola Sturgeon and the  SNP
attributes.additional_details: keeps on about a indy ref and will not again listen to the people of scotland, wants to disband  the union with the uk and destroy the future of scottish youth!
attributes.background: her and her party are hell bent on destroying the union of the UK and continually will not listen to the people of scotland.

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
